alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 1:50AM EST until February 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From early this morning to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Moderate flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 AM EST Friday the stage was 23.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest near 26.2 feet on Saturday. The river will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.9 feet on 04/04/2015. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued by 2 PM EST.
